Text: MARAMING SALAMAT! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!
As always, thanks!  Your scans are the best (and most reliable),  I'll keep my eye out for the other Fear Itself tie-ins that were released today.

Has anyone been able to find Fear Itself: Fearsome Four #1?  I've been looking practically non-stop since late Wednesday for it with no luck.  I found the other two Fear Itself tie-ins (Fear Itself: Deadpool #1 and Journey Into Mystery #624), but no luck on Fearsome Four :-/
Thank you for this & all your high quality ups.
